channel.title: Bertone Mantide
channel.description:
The price of the new Bertone Mantide has been released, according to many as 'reassuringly expensive'. $2.6 million to be precise.
Judging by its looks it is a heap of rubbish although the performance of the car may be slightly better due to the great level of speed.
http://www.topgear.com/au/car-news/bertone-mantide-2009-05-06
But honestly, have a look at these pictures. Scroll down into 'See more Mantide pics'. Have a look especially at number 1 and 2 of 6. You can't deny that it looks like crap, can you? Your opinion may be different but this is only mine.

item.title: Bertone Mantide
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

The wheels look really odd to me (looks as if there is a face imprinted on them!) without a doubt. I guess it doesn’t look that bad if you look at it from a diagonal angle from the back but still, it’s not worth $2.6 million is it?

Read full topic

item.title: Bertone Mantide
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

Elijah:

Some parts of it I like, some I don’t. I like the rims, and the rear( Sounds dirty ). Otherwise it looks like an uglier and more expensive version of a '94 Pontiac Firebird

I do see what you mean. It probably looks ugly because of the front design.

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:3, topic:278165”]Looks a lot like the Fenomenon Stratos:
Only 1 was produced and it was $730,000
[/quote]

Yeah, a little bit, although you can’t really judge it because you can’t see the front. When was this released? 2005 judging by the number plate?

Read full topic
